boardgame.description: In Pandemic, several virulent diseases have broken out simultaneously all over the world! The players are disease-fighting specialists whose mission is to treat disease hotspots while researching cures for each of four plagues before they get out of hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game board depicts several major population centers on Earth. On each turn, a player can use up to four actions to travel between cities, treat infected populaces, discover a cure, or build a research station. A deck of cards provides the players with these abilities, but sprinkled throughout this deck are Epidemic! cards that accelerate and intensify the diseases' activity. A second, separate deck of cards controls the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;normal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; spread of the infections._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Taking a unique role within the team, players must plan their strategy to mesh with their specialists' strengths in order to conquer the diseases. For example, the Operations Expert can build research stations which are needed to find cures for the diseases and which allow for greater mobility between cities; the Scientist needs only four cards of a particular disease to cure it instead of the normal five_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;but the diseases are spreading quickly and time is running out. If one or more diseases spreads beyond recovery or if too much time elapses, the players all lose. If they cure the four diseases, they all win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2013 edition of Pandemic includes two new characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;the Contingency Planner and the Quarantine Specialist_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;not available in earlier editions of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Pandemic is the first game in the Pandemic series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I am selling my copy of Pandemic. It has only been played twice, and everything is in like-new condition. This is the 1st edition, and all the correct cards/tokens/pieces are accounted for and in excellent shape. I have all the game components bagged up since the box insert is the most useless insert I have ever seen, but I did not throw away the insert so I guess you can judge for yourself. ;) I try to be as detailed as possible in my descriptions, so I am including a picture of a half-of-a-grain-of-rice sized ding on the side of the box cover that was there the day I got it. The ding is hard to see, but I tried to capture it as best I could with my camera. I will accept payment by PayPal from a verified address/account. I am asking for $20 plus $10 to ship in the USA (from southern California) by Priority Mail with tracking. I would prefer a non-credit card payment so I can skip the PayPal fee - if you pay by credit card, then the price is $21 plus $10 shipping. I have no problem with international shipping if you have sufficient positive feedback ratings, but we will have to work out shipping costs separately. I will generally ship same day if I get your payment before 1:00 PM Pacific or so. Thanks for looking!

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7021) Designed by Matt Leacock Four diseases have broken out in the world and it is up to a team of specialists in various fields to find cures for these diseases before mankind is wiped out. Players must work together, playing to their characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; strengths and planning their strategy of eradication before the diseases overwhelm the world with ever-increasing outbreaks. For example, the Operation Specialist can build research stations, which are needed to find cures for the diseases. The Scientist needs only 4 cards of a particular disease to cure it instead of the normal 5. But the diseases are outbreaking fast and time is running out: the team must try to stem the tide of infection in diseased areas while also towards cures. A truly cooperative game where you all win or you all lose. Pandemic is also in these languages: French and German. Contents: board, 96 wooden cubes (for diseases), 5 pawns, 6 wooden research stations, 6 markers: 1 outbreak marker, 1 infection rate marker, and 4 cure markers, 115 Cards: 48 infection cards, 59 player cards, 4 role cards, and 4 quick reference cards No. of players: 2-4 Ages: 10+ Playing time: 45-60 minutes

You are specialists at the CDC/Atlanta where you watch several virulent diseases break out simultaneously all over the world. The team mission is to prevent a world-wide pandemic outbreak, treating hotspots while researching cures for each of the four plagues before they get out of hand. Players must plan their strategy to mesh their specialist_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s strengths before the diseases overwhelm the world. For example, the Operations Specialist can build research stations, which are needed to find cures for the diseases. The Scientist needs only 4 cards of a particular disease to cure it instead of the normal 5. But the diseases are breaking out fast and time is running out: the team must try to stem the tide of infection in diseased areas while developing cures. If disease spreads uncontrolled, the players all lose. If they can cure all four diseases, they win. The board shows earth with some big population centres. On each turn a player can use four actions to travel, cure, discover and build. Cards are used for this but the deck also contains Epidemics... Shipping inside the United States is $10.00. Z-Man Games (ZMG 7021)
Four diseases have broken out in the world and it is up to a team of specialists in various fields to find cures for these diseases before mankind is wiped out. Players must work together, playing to their characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; strengths and planning their strategy of eradication before the diseases overwhelm the world with ever-increasing outbreaks. For example, the Operation Specialist can build research stations, which are needed to find cures for the diseases. The Scientist needs only 4 cards of a particular disease to cure it instead of the normal 5. But the diseases are outbreaking fast and time is running out: the team must try to stem the tide of infection in diseased areas while also towards cures. A truly cooperative game where you all win or you all lose.

So, was bedeutet das jetzt konkret? Zunächst mal ist die Box laminiert worden, was ja schon mal ganz gut ist. Auf dem Deckel der Box ist ein etwa 5*3 cm großer Aufkleber mit einlaminiert, auf dem unter anderem der ehemalige Scancode der Bücherei drauf ist. Auf der Innenseite des Deckels ist eine Liste der Spielteile eingeklebt und ein Stempel, dass das Spiel aussortiert wurde. Man kann dort auch sehen, dass nur eine Ausleihe des Spieles eingetragen wurde. Auf der Anleitung ist auch ein Stempel. Das gesamte Spielmaterial selbst ist ohne Beklebungen etc. und vollkommen in Ordnung.
